CustomField.description: This field is a duplicate of the Parent Account ID -- was required to be referenced in an email template since there were 2 other fields with similar API names and field labels that the merge-fields were not working.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is a duplicate of the Parent Account ID -- was required to be referenced in an email template since there were 2 other fields with similar API names and field labels that the merge-fields were not working.
CustomField.label: Email Template Parent Account ID
